welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Green, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the unique culture and experiences this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Akron/canton Regional Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Akron/canton Regional Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fulton International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wayne County Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Wayne County Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
